author: meowbroski
content: Alright, so i have looked into alot of stuff related to the solutions for the Scalability problem when it comes to Ethereum

author: meowbroski
content: From what i understand, its divided into tackling execution layer (lower level) and/or the consensus layer (higher level)

author: meowbroski
content: From the developers point of view (those who dont work for Ethereum), we cant actually gain access or even try to change the exectuion layer right?

author: meowbroski
content: so, the non-Ethereum employed developers usually look for solutions within the consensus layer

author: meowbroski
content:
So, some of the Consensus layer solutions are: 
  1. Sidechains
  2. Rollups
  2. Sharding

author: meowbroski
content: Now, in this case if i want to lets say analyse the TPS based on each solution (mentioned above), that is realistic ?
